A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"Farce\" Awakens was a 3/10\, this was a 5/10 and Rogue One was 8/10. Still too many plots holes\, bad writing and wasted characters for me. I say that and still like it better than Farce Awakens. That movie was just pure bad. These writers and directors are all drunk on the Disney KoolAid and can't tell a decent story.
